summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Beskar IT website with updated products, services, compliance frameworks, and support email integration. All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend health endpoint (/api/health) returns correct status and message
Contact form submission (/api/contact) works correctly and saves data
Contact form validation properly rejects invalid data
Navigation menu displays all required links (Products, Services, Compliance, Impact, Contact)
Hero section displays correctly with proper CTAs (Explore Products, Contact Us)
Products section shows all 4 products: GRC Nexus, OSINT Toolkit, LiteSabre Scanner, Amidala CSPM
Product cards are clickable and open detail modals with proper functionality
Services section displays all 6 services: Security Auditing, VAPT Services, Secure Code Review, CSPM & Cloud Security, Framework Implementation, Managed Security
Compliance section shows comprehensive frameworks including ISO 27001, ISO 42001, SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS, CCPA, DPDPA, SAMA
Impact section displays all statistics with proper counters
Contact section displays support@beskarit.com email correctly
Contact form submission works end-to-end with backend integration
Contact form returns success message with support@beskarit.com
Footer displays support@beskarit.com and all product/service links
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (4/4 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and integrations working)
